channel.title: RXR Coders Team!
channel.description:
This is one of the best coders sites out there
we have lots of open spots like:
Admins Mods Coders Game Design and much much more..!!!
If your interested in this then send me this message:
[code]Name: Server Position: Experience:[/code]
come join today at - rxrcoders.smfforfree2.com =)

item.title: RXR Coders Team!
item.dc:creator: @As_Life_Changes As Life Changes
item.description:
@As_Life_Changes wrote:

LeScape Pk:

i think there should have to be some kind of mod approval before making a code team, because 40% of them are noobs who cant code getting people to work for them, 40% of them are noobs who arent dedicated and die out, and 20% of them are actually serious people

lol yea well said =P but im serious about it even if no one else is

Read full topic

item.description:

item.title: RXR Coders Team!
item.dc:creator: @As_Life_Changes As Life Changes
item.description:
@As_Life_Changes wrote:

Name: Tyler or As Life Changes
Server Position: Coder/Admin
Experience: alot in both ive coded 8 servers only 5 released inthe 5 include metal scape pk project metal v1 and pk4lifescape and soon to be released banditz pk

if you think im a noob at coding give me a test

note: im not going to spend all day on a code like full duel arena just to get rejected by a team
